name: Outside the Box (gamecollab)
description:
WARNING: If you have a history of insensitivity to irony, do not run the game. Certain patterns may trigger outbursts of anger and misunderstanding.

A masterpiece of creators who created nothing! A game long-awaited by nobody and for some reason finally available for playing!

 AAAA!!!!!!! world-class project:

- Open world (not)

- Advanced artificial intelligence (not)

- Crossplatform multiplayer (not)

- Run on PC with your ancient GPU (maybe)

Khaos and craziness! Are you ready to take up the challenge and find an exit from this mad world? Are you ready to comprehend what’s going on there and the connections between everything? Are you ready to think outside the box? 

This game is made only for those ones who aren’t afraid of difficulties and ready to show ingenuity and resourcefulness. We filled up the game with “easter eggs” and references to pop culture and wondering whether you’ll be able to find ‘em all.

 Starring A-list actors:

  • Cactus as Accountant
  • Gus as Colleague
  • Worm as Pirate
  • Cloud as Cloud
  • Jellyfish as Bouncer
  • Lifebelt as Lifesaver
  • House as Antipode
  • Mollusque as Seashell Dweller

And many others...
